p: G.D. is on the Scientific Advisory Board and receives research funding from Janssen Research and Development, LLC, is a consultant for Roche Pharmaceuticals and Akili, Inc., receives research funding from PerkinElmer, and receives royalties from Guilford Press and University of Oxford Press. J.K. is Director of the Carolinas Cord Blood Bank and Medical Director of Cord: Use Cord Blood Bank. The other authors indicated no potential conflicts of interest.
